channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Forms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Forms

item.title: CVE-2021-24505|2024-08-03T19:35:19.880Z -- unknown -- forms
item.description: The Forms WordPress plugin before 1.12.3 did not sanitise its input fields, leading to Stored Cross-Site scripting issues. The plugin was vulnerable to an Authenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability within the Forms "Add new" field.
